mapper.insert: insert into book_info (`name`, author, publish, ISBN, introduction, `language`, `price`, pub_date, class_id, `number`, `cover_img`, `score`) values (#{name}, #{author}, #{publish}, #{ISBN}, #{introduction}, #{language}, #{price}, #{pub_date}, #{class_id}, #{number}, #{coverImg}, #{score})
mapper.update: update library.book_info set `name`=#{name}, author=#{author}, publish=#{publish}, ISBN=#{ISBN}, introduction=#{introduction}, `language`=#{language}, `price`=#{price}, pub_date=#{pubDate}, class_id=#{classId}, `number`=#{number} where book_id = #{bookId}
mapper.select: WHERE ABS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),book_info.pub_date)) < 180 ORDER BY library.book_info.score DESC LIMIT #{recommendedBookSize};
